mapper.sql: lc_low_fields.id, lc_low_fields.list_font_weight AS listFontWeight, lc_low_fields.list_font_size AS listFontSize, lc_low_fields.list_font_color AS listFontColor, lc_low_fields.list_column_key AS listColumnKey, lc_low_fields.list_column_name AS listColumnName, lc_low_fields.list_column_type AS listColumnType, lc_low_fields.list_column_layout AS listColumnLayout, lc_low_fields.list_column_align AS listColumnAlign, lc_low_fields.list_column_width AS listColumnWidth, lc_low_fields.list_column_reference AS listColumnReference, lc_low_fields.list_column_format AS listColumnFormat, lc_low_fields.list_column_options AS listColumnOptions, lc_low_fields.list_column_multi_type AS listColumnMultiType, lc_low_fields.list_column_multi_keys AS listColumnMultiKeys, lc_low_fields.field_item_name AS fieldItemName, lc_low_fields.field_binding AS fieldBinding, lc_low_fields.field_label AS fieldLabel, lc_low_fields.field_value_options AS fieldValueOptions, lc_low_fields.field_value_filter AS fieldValueFilter, lc_low_fields.field_scopes AS fieldScopes, lc_low_fields.field_scope AS fieldScope, lc_low_fields.form_field_title AS formFieldTitle, lc_low_fields.form_field_hint AS formFieldHint, lc_low_fields.form_field_tips AS formFieldTips, lc_low_fields.form_input_type AS formInputType, lc_low_fields.form_input_options AS formInputOptions, lc_low_fields.form_view_type AS formViewType, lc_low_fields.form_view_options AS formViewOptions, lc_low_fields.form_input_required AS formInputRequired, lc_low_fields.form_field_question AS formFieldQuestion, lc_low_fields.page_id AS pageId, lc_low_fields.list_image_width AS listImageWidth, lc_low_fields.list_image_height AS listImageHeight, lc_low_fields.input_width AS inputWidth, lc_low_fields.sort_num AS sortNum, lc_low_fields.field_view_one_many_options AS fieldViewOneManyOptions
mapper.select: SELECT lc_low_fields.* FROM lc_low_fields WHERE lc_low_fields.id = #{id} GROUP BY lc_low_fields.id

SELECT
FROM lc_low_fields
WHERE 1=1
AND lc_low_fields.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_font_weight LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listFontWeight},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_font_size LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listFontSize},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_font_color LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listFontColor},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_key LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnKey},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnName},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnType},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_layout LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnLayout},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_align LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnAlign},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnWidth},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_reference LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnReference},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_format LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnFormat},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_options LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnOptions},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_multi_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnMultiType},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_column_multi_keys LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listColumnMultiKeys},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.field_item_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fieldItemName},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.field_binding LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fieldBinding},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.field_label LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fieldLabel},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.field_value_options LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fieldValueOptions},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.field_value_filter LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fieldValueFilter},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.field_scopes LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fieldScopes},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.field_scope LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.fieldScope},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.form_field_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formFieldTitle},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.form_field_hint LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formFieldHint},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.form_field_tips LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formFieldTips},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.form_input_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formInputType},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.form_input_options LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formInputOptions},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.form_view_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formViewType},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.form_view_options LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formViewOptions},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.form_input_required LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formInputRequired},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.form_field_question LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.formFieldQuestion},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.page_id = #{record.pageId}
AND lc_low_fields.list_image_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listImageWidth},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.list_image_height LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.listImageHeight},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.input_width LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.inputWidth},'%')
AND lc_low_fields.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND lc_low_fields.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
order by sort_num asc
